content:
I've packed all the spare fishing rods and bait I have into this bag.
Just like how you need to prepare the right gear for an adventure,
you need the right tools to fish!

No problem!
I've put a spare fishing rod in your backpack!
Fishing is my specialty, you know!

This is what I found!
Wanna see what I got from my last adventure?

Hehe, need a fishing rod? No problem!
But... your toolbox is full, that's a problem.
Come back once you've made some space!
